summary: This bill, the Reinforcing Sanctions on Iranian Terrorists Act, aims to strengthen sanctions related to Mahan Air, an Iranian airline. The bill highlights Mahan Air's alleged support for the Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps-Qods Force (IRGC-QF) and its involvement in transporting fighters to Syria. It calls for the President to determine, within 90 days of enactment, whether to apply sanctions to the Iran Airports Company. The bill is primarily focused on national security by targeting an Iranian airline.
